LanguageData.Hungover.stages.mild_hangover.label: Hungover (slight)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.serious_hangover.label: Hungover (strong)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.serious_hangover.descrip: My head hurts from all that liquor.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.pounding_hangover.label: Hungover (pounding)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.pounding_hangover.descri: It feels like a gaggle of geese are pecking at my skull.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.hung_over_hidden.label: hungover-hidden
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.alcohol_warmth.label: buzzed-hidden
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.quite_inebriated.label: Inebriated (warm)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.quite_inebriated.descr: I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.drunk.label: Inebriated (tipsy)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.drunk.description: I'm a bit wobbly! And this is quite enjoyable.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.hammered.label: Inebriated (drunk)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.hammered.description: I feel so uninhibited and unafraid! This is a great time!
